overview: A suitcase is about to leave its surroundings, but she soon realizes that things inside that load have weighed her down. The suitcase tries to lighten its load. He pulls something out of himself every time. But it is not light. Until he finally realizes that the things within him are not the cause of heaviness and in fact heaviness has another cause. In fact, memories, belongings, and attachments are the reason for the weight of luggage.
title: Empty Place
